name: Notion Reading List
description: Never forget a book again!Do you find yourself struggling to keep track of all the books you want to read? Or maybe you're forgetful about which books you've already read? With this template:You can easily organize your books into a wishlist and a read list, making it simple to see what you've already read and what's next on your list. Retro design is customizable, allowing you to add any other details that matter to you.You can also set goals for yourself with the Reading Goal page that comes w
features: You can easilyorganize your booksinto awishlistand aread list, making it simple to see what you've already read and what's next on your list.; Retro design iscustomizable, allowing you to add any other details that matter to you.; Add personalnotesandreviewsfor each book you read. This allows you to keep track of your thoughts on each book and refer back to them in the future.
